name: glob
title: Glob
description: Match files using the patterns the shell uses, like stars and stuff.

end.title: End
end.description: When the matching is finished, this is emitted with all the matches found. If the `nonull` option is set, and no match was found, then the `matches` list contains the original pattern. The matches are sorted, unless the `nosort` flag is set.

match.title: Match
match.description: Every time a match is found, this is emitted with the matched.

error.title: Error
error.description: Emitted when an unexpected error is encountered, or whenever any fs error occurs if `options.strict` is set.

abort.title: Abort
abort.description: When `abort()` is called, this event is raised.
